price: 33. Wuxuuna idiin sakhiray qorraxda iyo dayaxa, labaduba joogto ugu socdaan rugahooda; idiinna sakhiray habeenka iyo maalinta.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
